context: Dental Implant Fixing,Bone graft,RCT - Single Sitting,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
I am very happy and satisfied by my treatment by Dr. Lalit at LADIVYA DENTAL. 
I got almost everything done like Noble Biocare  Implants for my lower left jaw, 7 RCTS and 28 Zirconia crowns. 
Its worth giving some time now to enjoy my future with healthy and beautiful smile. ☺  .
I thank all doctors and staff for their imejand energy. 
I recommend all to just believe and do whatever Dr. ask you in regards of the treatment, I am sure you will be more than happy. All the best for your future endeavours. 
Mrs. Rita Sabharwal

context: Dental Implant Fixing,Cosmetic Filling,Smile Designing,Smile Designing,
review:
I have no words to thank the team of Drs @ Ladivya Dental Clinic, they just changed my smile so beautifully. I got everything done from implants to esthetic zirconia crowns. 
I got my complete smile makeover here. I wanna say people who wanna  accurate opinion regarding their smile  and treatment can visit or book online appointment through PRACTO APP. FOR
 DR. DIVYANGNA CHAUDHARY AND DR. LALIT KUMAR.
I am so so happy that I am gonna tell everybody from where I got this makeover done and that's to in 5-7 days prior to my wedding. 
Thank you all

Hi, I am writing on behalf of my father who underwent dental procedure and who in 92+ of age. 
We are very much satisfied and feel safe in getting treatment here. There was huge swelling on my fathers left side face region due to dental cause. But, timely treatment improved his deterioting health since then we have full trust in this Dental  Hospital. 
Moreover, the doctors team are very caring and down to earth. They explain every steps and precautions to take before, during and after treatment. Its absolutely an outstanding behaviour from the team. 
I lastly thank and congratulate Dr Lalit Kumar and Dr. Divyangna and all doctors of LADIVYA DENTALCARE for their new centre at Rajouri Garden.I will surely visit there and recommend my near and dears  for same.
With warm regards.

I came for Implant and filling treatment here been referred by another Dentist  finding my case to be a tough one. I am very much satisfied by the job done.
Dr. Lalit Rocks not only in dentistry but overall personality is just mind blowing. I came with so much worry but Dr. Lalit motivated me and took away all my tension and worries. 
I find myself blessed to add another name to my account which are with me for lifetime. 
I recommend all patients to visit LADIVYA CENTRES FOR ORAL HEALTH CARE once in their life to experience quality and reliable treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Lalit is very professional in his field and I liked his expertise while attending my dental issues. Implant he did very perfectly and same is my experience in RCT he did earlier in another teeth. **** **** ******* I am very much satisfied with his treatment

I am satisfied that there was no pain during the procedure.
I like the way the Dr. Lalit listens to everything I say and ease me with his words and rest his clinical expertise justifies what he says. Marvelous clinician. 
My every wishes for LaDivya Dental.

All praises for Dr. Lalit  and Dr. Divyangna of LADIVYA DENTAL CARE.
I got my Rct done with zirconia crown. I am totally satisfied by the treatment. 
He is like our family dentist. If somebody ask my suggestions for dental treatment, no second thought comes other than him.
Regards,
Mr. Submit Kaura

My case was very difficult to treat all I got very few teeth in my mouth I went many extractions before. So, I had very few teeth to chew. I saw the results of my wife Mrs. Rita Sabharwal and got motivated for getting implants. It was a wonderful experience that I never felt any pain while placing Implants. I got full mouth rehab with all Zirconia crowns. I am very much satisfied and happy.
Now, I keep sending patients to this centre as they are truly geniune , **** *** ***********

I feel very happy to share my dental treatment experiences here at Ladivya Centre for Oral Health Care. 
I underwent rcts and bridges from another dental clinic but within less then a year I couldn't eat properly. So,I came to Dr. Lalit, one of the names in dentistry you can bank upon. 
I am now without pain and 100 % satisfied. Thanks Dr.
With all good wishes.
Mrs Zonal Singh
New Delhi

Hi everyone, I am a MBBS doctor, I came here for my teeth alignment, I had irregular teeth. Dr. Lalit started my treatment and I am very happy with the process, the environment is very friendly and hygienic here, I hoping a very nice result of my treatment. * ****** *** *** ** ***** **** ****** *** *** **** ****** ******** ** **** *** *** ******Thank you

It was an amazing experience to get 6 Dental Implants placed at my jaws. I thought it is going to be a painful treatment but the truth is the whole procedure was painless and done very professionally. I will surely tell others that LADIVYA in dental is pioneer in Dental treatment. 
Thanks

I visited to show my gums and check region which is red and swollen. Also, my crown and bridge fixed elsewhere got damaged. But, simple mediations and timely follow up relieved my pain. I feel now relaxed and fee from the worry of dental & gum disease. Thank you all Doctors of LaDivya Dental Clinics. ☺☺☺

I am fully satisfied with the services got here I.e LADIVYA CENTRES FOR ORAL HEALTH CARE, Vikas puri.
I underwent Rct  here and it was truly a  painless procedure. 
I will recommend others too for same. 
At least I request people to have a 2 nd opinion and treatment  if they are not happy with their Dentist.

It was a unique way of dealing. Dr. Lalit is so so friendly that I was very comfortable in getting my wisdom teeth removed. 
The implant procedure here took just 15 minutes I was wondering that if this is at all real. As
I wish him good luck and urge to be like that. 
Mr. Vijay Thakral,
Vikas puri,
New Delhi, INDIA

I am very happy and fully satisfied by LADIVYA DENTAL CLINIC ,VIKAS PURI CENTRE . 
I UNDERWENT RCT S AND ZIRCONIA CROWNS. RCT S WERE EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE AND THE ZIRCONIA ROWNS WERE FABULOUS. I LIKE TO GIVE GOOD WISHES TO THE TEAM AND WILL TAKE BENEFIT OF THEM IN FUTURE.
WILL SURELY RECOMMEND MY WIFE & RELATIVES.

I came with severe pain. 
I underwent an RCT . I know I was in safe hands as my father him self got treated  here. 
The treatment was absolutely pain free . 
Truly I liking this place as I was afraid going to dentist. Moreover, the payment part is very transparent and yet economical. Three cheers for Ladivya Dental Clinic Team, Vikas  puri Branch.
Regards,
Mrs. Annu

review:
Dr Lalit and team are experts in their field and have been kind to solve my dental pain. 
I highly recommend the doctor because they value your time and money and give satisfactory treatment.

The results of my braces treatment at LADIVYA DENTAL CLINIC was awesome.
Dr. Lalit and his team was always there to explain about the treatment progression. 
I will surely recommend others to get their smile make over from here.

review: An Experienced n humble Expert Doctor who consult in detailed manner ,which gives total mental satisfaction.
The doctor gave an appointment even though he wasn't available. Had to wait 1.5 hrs. The consultation was also unsatisfactory.

I recieved world class environment and treatment here. 
Thanks for seeing my case at emergency level till 11 pm. 
I admire your dedication and hard work. Dr. Lalit is very down to earth. Thanks again

I am undergoing rct treatment here. I am till date satisfied with the treatment and the waiting time is almost negligible.
Thanks alot

I am undergoing dental treatment here for the first time and quite satisfied till date. I was having severe pain earlier but now there is almost no pain. 
Thanks alot . LADIVYA.DENTALCARE
I am very satisfied by the treatment and personnel behaviour of the Doctors here. I am totally satisfied and happy with everything. I am surely recommend others for getting the treatment.

I am very happy to get dental advice and treatment done here. I am looking forward to visit again and again in future for further need. 
Best dental facility in west Delhi .☺

The confidence of Dr. Lalit at LaDivya Dental Clinic is beyond words. I am totally satisfied. 
Will surely tell others about the cost effective and 100% treatment satisfaction.
Very much happy and satisfied. I like the ambience and confidence in treatment. Thanks a lot for giving all the positivity in me.☺
I underwent a surgical tooth extraction and gum surgery here. I am now very happy and can eat from that side. Thanks Dr. Lalit for listening my problem thouroghly and rendering treatment.
